unnormalised: Okay, so you're searching for scholarships? Forget slogging through a million Google searches! Let's talk scholarship portals.
normalised: Okay, so you are searching for scholarships? Forget slogging through a million Google searches! Let us talk scholarship portals.

unnormalised: Seriously, if you're even remotely considering further studies, especially post-grad stuff, you NEED to know about these. They're like the Swiggy of scholarships – a curated list delivered right to your "doorstep" (or, you know, your browser).
normalised: Seriously, if you are even remotely considering further studies, especially post-grad stuff, you need to know about these. They are like the Swiggy of scholarships – a curated list delivered right to your “doorstep” (or, you know, your browser).

unnormalised: Think of it this way: Instead of hitting up every college website (imagine applying to every department at IIT Bombay individually!), these portals aggregate scholarships from various organizations, trusts, and even the government. You can filter by course, location (India or abroad), your category (SC/ST/OBC/General), and even by your parents' income level. Some even let you search by caste, though that's a slightly thorny issue, isn't it?

unnormalised: Plus, many Indian scholarship portals are now integrating seamlessly with your Aadhaar details, making KYC a breeze. It's faster than ordering a plate of momos from your local ठेला!

unnormalised: My cousin, Priya Sharma, landed a fully funded PhD at Oxford because she used a portal. She said it saved her weeks of tedious research.
normalised: My cousin, Priya Sharma, landed a fully funded P H D at Oxford because she used a portal. She said it saved her weeks of tedious research.

unnormalised: So, which ones are good? That depends! Some popular ones include Buddy4Study, Vidyalakshmi Portal (Govt.), and ScholarshipIndia. Just remember to read the fine print, *especially* the eligibility criteria. Don't be like Rancho from 3 Idiots and assume you can just waltz into anywhere without checking the rules!
